pullRequest.title: Mappings relating to code that uses CsvWriter

commit.message: Mappings relating to code that uses CsvWriter

nodes.bodyText: Is this like the "gui_light": "side" in item model? I feel this name itself isn't very clear and might get some javadocs.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,5 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_777 net/minecraft/client/render/model/BakedQuad
+	FIELD field_22441 directionalLighting Z

nodes.bodyText: I'd suggest getDebugMessage or getDumpMessage if this is only used for dumping. getString doesn't sound very informative...

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 0 pos1
          
          
            
            		ARG 1 pos2
          
          
            
            		ARG 2 horSize
          
          
            
            		ARG 0 startPos
          
          
            
            		ARG 1 endPos
          
          
            
            		ARG 2 horizontalSize

nodes.bodyText: What's a dump string? How is different from getDebugString?
What does "area" mean here? What's the "horizontal size" and why isn't it determined by start and end positions?
